snippet: Joann West, whose son, Zaquan, 25, has a genetic disorder that causes tumors on his skin, offers him unflagging support while trying to let him be as independent as he wants to be.
abstract: Community Service Society helps Joann West of Bedford-Stuyvesant, Brooklyn, and her disabled son cover their rent.
lead_paragraph: Joann West, whose son, Zaquan, 25, has a genetic disorder that causes tumors on his skin, offers him unflagging support while trying to let him be as independent as he wants to be.

headline.print_headline: Protective Brooklyn Mother And a Disabled Son Face Life’s Challenges Together
headline.seo: Disabled Young Man and His Protective Mother Deal With Life’s Challenges
headline.main: Protective Brooklyn Mother and a Disabled Son Face Life’s Challenges Together
